players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, I'm surprised you're investigating so quickly. This must be a big test for your detective skills."
Diana: "Charlie, I think we should focus on gathering more information before making any accusations."
Charlie: "Bob's death is a wake-up call for us. We need to work together and share information to uncover the truth behind his murder."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Bob was a good guy, I'm sad he's gone."
Diana: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested
